Hands-On Exercise 11: Calibrating Spatial Interaction Models with R

Hands-On Exercise

Calibrating Spatial Interaction Models with R

Author

Matthew Ho

Published

March 30, 2024

Modified

March 30, 2024

Dependencies

pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, sp,
               performance, reshape2,
               ggpubr, tidyverse)

Loading Data

mpsz <- read_rds("data/rds/mpsz.rds")
mpsz_sp <- as(mpsz, "Spatial")
dist <- spDists(mpsz_sp, 
                longlat = FALSE)
head(dist, n=c(10, 10))

Rename Columns

sz_names <- mpsz$SUBZONE_C

colnames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)
rownames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)

Pivot Distance Value

distPair <- melt(dist) %>%
  rename(dist = value)
head(distPair, 10)
   Var1 Var2     dist
1     1    1    0.000
2     2    1 1116.521
3     3    1 3917.380
4     4    1 4474.975
5     5    1 4727.005
6     6    1 4271.837
7     7    1 2547.757
8     8    1 5563.088
9     9    1 2042.758
10   10    1 5148.252

Update Intra-Zonal Distances

distPair %>%
  filter(dist > 0) %>%
  summary()
      Var1             Var2             dist        
 Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :  173.8  
 1st Qu.: 83.75   1st Qu.: 83.75   1st Qu.: 7149.5  
 Median :166.50   Median :166.50   Median :11890.0  
 Mean   :166.50   Mean   :166.50   Mean   :12229.4  
 3rd Qu.:249.25   3rd Qu.:249.25   3rd Qu.:16401.7  
 Max.   :332.00   Max.   :332.00   Max.   :49894.4  
distPair$dist <- ifelse(distPair$dist == 0,
                        50, distPair$dist)

distPair %>%
  summary()
      Var1             Var2             dist      
 Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :  1.00   Min.   :   50  
 1st Qu.: 83.75   1st Qu.: 83.75   1st Qu.: 7097  
 Median :166.50   Median :166.50   Median :11864  
 Mean   :166.50   Mean   :166.50   Mean   :12193  
 3rd Qu.:249.25   3rd Qu.:249.25   3rd Qu.:16388  
 Max.   :332.00   Max.   :332.00   Max.   :49894  
distPair <- distPair %>%
  rename(orig = Var1,
         dest = Var2)
write_rds(distPair, "data/rds/distPair.rds") 
distPair <- read_rds("data/rds/distPair.rds")
